General.Name: Everdisplay Optronics Shanghai Co Ltd
General.Description: Everdisplay Optronics (Shanghai) Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sell high-resolution small and medium-sized AMOLED semiconductor display panels in China and internationally. The company offers active-matrix organic light-emitting diode display products. Its products are used in consumer terminal electronic products, such as smartphones, smart wearables, tablets/notebooks, computers, and automotives. Everdisplay Optronics (Shanghai) Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 2012 and is based in Shanghai, China.
